NonWrappedAsset().details: Throws when called wrapped associated function on the non-wrapped asset

NotAuthorized().details: Throws when action is not authorized

NotLive().details: Throws if the contract called when it is not live

NotUpgrader().details: Throws when function called not by upgrader

join(address,address,uint256).details: Joins ERC20 compatible assets directly from known address

join(address,address,uint256,(address,ui.details: Joins ERC20 compatible assets directly from known address with permit

join(address,uint256).details: Joins ERC20 compatible assets directly from sender

joinWrapped(address,uint256).details: Joins ERC20 compatible assets directly from sender

set(bytes32,address).details: Allows to set the contract props

set(bytes32,uint256).details: Allows to set the contract props
